verses.verse: I lifted up <WH5375> my eyes, <WH5869> and saw, <WH7200> and behold, <WH376> a man with a measuring <WH4060> line <WH2256> in his hand. <WH3027>

Then I asked, <WH559> "Where are you going? <WH1980>" He said <WH559> to me, <WH4058> "To measure Jerusalem, <WH3389> to see <WH7200> what <WH4100> is its breadth <WH7341> and what is its length. <WH753>"
Behold, <WH4397> the angel who talked <WH1696> with me went forth, <WH3318> and another <WH312> angel <WH4397> went out <WH3318> to meet him, <WH7125>

and said <WH559> to him, <WH7323> "Run, speak <WH1696> to this <WH1975> young man, <WH5288> saying, <WH559> <WH3389> 'Jerusalem will be inhabited <WH3427> as villages without walls, <WH6519> because of the multitude <WH7230> of men <WH120> and livestock <WH929> in it. <WH8432>
For I, <WH5002>' says Yahweh, <WH3068> <WH2346> 'will be to her a wall of fire <WH784> around <WH5439> it, <WH3519> and I will be the glory in the midst of her. <WH8432>

Come! <WH1945> Come! <WH1945> Flee <WH5127> from the land <WH776> of the north, <WH6828>' says <WH5002> Yahweh; <WH3068> <WH6566> 'for I have spread you abroad as the four <WH702> winds <WH7307> of the sky, <WH8064>' says <WH5002> Yahweh. <WH3068>
<WH1945> 'Come, Zion! <WH6726> Escape, <WH4422> you who dwell <WH3427> with the daughter <WH1323> of Babylon. <WH894>'

For thus says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies: <WH6635> <WH310> 'For honor <WH3519> he has sent <WH7971> me to the nations <WH1471> which plundered <WH7997> you; <WH5060> for he who touches you touches <WH5060> the apple <WH892> of his eye. <WH5869>

For, <WH5130> behold, I will shake my hand <WH3027> over them, <WH7998> and they will be a spoil to those who served <WH5647> them; <WH3045> and you will know that Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies <WH6635> has sent me. <WH7971>
Sing <WH7442> and rejoice, <WH8055> daughter <WH1323> of Zion; <WH6726> for, <WH935> behold, I come, and I will dwell <WH7931> in the midst <WH8432> of you, <WH5002>' says Yahweh. <WH3068>

Many <WH7227> nations <WH1471> shall join <WH3867> themselves to Yahweh <WH3068> in that day, <WH3117> and shall be my people; <WH5971> and I will dwell <WH7931> in the midst <WH8432> of you, <WH3045> and you shall know that Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies <WH6635> has sent me to you. <WH7971>
Yahweh <WH3068> will inherit <WH5157> Judah <WH3063> as his portion <WH2506> in the holy <WH6944> land, <WH127> and will again choose <WH977> Jerusalem. <WH3389>
Be silent, <WH2013> all flesh, <WH1320> before <WH6440> Yahweh; <WH3068> for he has roused <WH5782> himself from his holy <WH6944> habitation! <WH4583>"
